mapper.select: SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.product_category_id as productCategoryId, a.name as name, a.price as price, a.description as description, a.weight as weight FROM product a, product_branch_office b, branch_office c WHERE c.id_branch_office = b.branch_office_id_branch_office AND b.product_product_id = a.product_id AND c.id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a inner join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{branchId} AND a.name LIKE #{search} and a.status = 1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1 AND a.product_category_id = #{idcategory}

SELECT b.product_id as productId, b.name as name, b.price as price, (SELECT a.percentage FROM offers_register a WHERE a.product_product_id = #{productId} AND a.status = 1 ORDER BY a.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, b.description as description, (SELECT c.id_product_branch_office FROM product_branch_office c WHERE c.product_product_id = #{productId}) as branchId, b.qr_hash AS qrHash FROM product b WHERE product_id = #{productId}
SELECT stock_id as stockId, in_stock as inStock, last_update as lastUpdate FROM stock WHERE product_product_id = #{productId};

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage, (SELECT f.in_stock FROM stock f WHERE f.product_product_id = a.product_id) as unit
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{idbranch} AND a.status = 1

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, (SELECT c.percentage FROM offers_register c WHERE a.product_id = c.product_product_id AND c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.id_offers DESC LIMIT 1) as percentage, a.description as description, (SELECT d.name FROM product_category d WHERE d.id = a.product_id) as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage, (SELECT f.in_stock FROM stock f WHERE f.product_product_id = a.product_id) as unit
FROM product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE b.branch_office_id_branch_office = #{branchId} AND a.status = 1 AND a.product_category_id = #{categoryId} AND a.name LIKE #{product}

SELECT a.product_id as productId, a.name as name, a.price as price, 0 as percentage, a.description as description, c.name as category, (SELECT e.photo FROM media_product e WHERE a.product_id = e.product_product_id ORDER BY e.media_id DESC LIMIT 1) as firstImage, 0 AS unit FROM product_category c, product a join product_branch_office b on a.product_id = b.product_product_id WHERE a.qr_hash = #{hash} AND c.id = a.product_category_id AND a.status = 1
